title: Heated Massage
description: Alice is a young and shy massage therapist in an exclusive luxury spa. One day sheâ€™s ordered by her boss to become the personal masseuse for their most prestigious client, the gorgeous wife of a rich benefactor. Alice discovers her attraction to the beautiful older woman and finds out that the attraction is mutual. Lesbian desires awaken and result in a heated massage that neither of hem will ever forget.
author: K.C. Bloom
